typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	processDate as string (toString(currentUTC(),'yyyy-MM-dd'))
}
source(output(
		BeneID as string,
		ClaimID as string,
		ClaimStartDt as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		ClaimEndDt as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		Provider as string,
		InscClaimAmtReimbursed as string,
		AttendingPhysician as string,
		OperatingPhysician as string,
		OtherPhysician as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_1 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_2 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_3 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_4 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_5 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_6 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_7 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_8 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_9 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_10 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_1 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_2 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_3 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_4 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_5 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_6 as string,
		DeductibleAmtPaid as string,
		ClmAdmitDiagnosisCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:[(concat('fdengine/dev/fdsource/outpatient/',$processDate,'/*.csv'))]) ~> srcoutpatient
srcoutpatient derive(InscClaimAmtReimbursed = trim(iif(InscClaimAmtReimbursed == 'NA', '0', InscClaimAmtReimbursed),' '),
		DeductibleAmtPaid = trim(iif(DeductibleAmtPaid=='NA', '0', DeductibleAmtPaid),''),
		AttendingPhysician = trim(iif(AttendingPhysician=='NA', '', AttendingPhysician),''),
		OperatingPhysician = trim(iif(OperatingPhysician=='NA', '', OperatingPhysician),''),
		OtherPhysician = trim(iif(OtherPhysician=='NA', '', OtherPhysician),''),
		ClmDiagnosisCode_1 = trim(iif(ClmDiagnosisCode_1=='NA', '', ClmDiagnosisCode_1),''),
		ClmDiagnosisCode_2 = trim(iif(ClmDiagnosisCode_2=='NA', '', ClmDiagnosisCode_2),''),
		ClmDiagnosisCode_3 = trim(iif(ClmDiagnosisCode_3=='NA', '', ClmDiagnosisCode_3),''),
		ClmDiagnosisCode_4 = trim(iif(ClmDiagnosisCode_4=='NA', '', ClmDiagnosisCode_4),''),
		ClmDiagnosisCode_5 = trim(iif(ClmDiagnosisCode_5=='NA', '', ClmDiagnosisCode_5),''),
		ClmDiagnosisCode_6 = trim(iif(ClmDiagnosisCode_6=='NA', '', ClmDiagnosisCode_6),''),
		ClmDiagnosisCode_7 = trim(iif(ClmDiagnosisCode_7=='NA', '', ClmDiagnosisCode_7),''),
		ClmDiagnosisCode_8 = trim(iif(ClmDiagnosisCode_8=='NA', '', ClmDiagnosisCode_8),''),
		ClmDiagnosisCode_9 = trim(iif(ClmDiagnosisCode_9=='NA', '', ClmDiagnosisCode_9),''),
		ClmDiagnosisCode_10 = trim(iif(ClmDiagnosisCode_10=='NA', '', ClmDiagnosisCode_10),''),
		ClmProcedureCode_1 = trim(iif(ClmProcedureCode_1=='NA', '', ClmProcedureCode_1),''),
		ClmProcedureCode_2 = trim(iif(ClmProcedureCode_2=='NA', '', ClmProcedureCode_2),''),
		ClmProcedureCode_3 = trim(iif(ClmProcedureCode_3=='NA', '', ClmProcedureCode_3),''),
		ClmProcedureCode_4 = trim(iif(ClmProcedureCode_4=='NA', '', ClmProcedureCode_4),''),
		ClmProcedureCode_5 = trim(iif(ClmProcedureCode_5=='NA', '', ClmProcedureCode_5),''),
		ClmProcedureCode_6 = trim(iif(ClmProcedureCode_6=='NA', '', ClmProcedureCode_6),'')) ~> DerivedOutpatient
DerivedOutpatient sink(input(
		BeneID as string,
		ClaimID as string,
		ClaimStartDt as string,
		ClaimEndDt as string,
		Provider as string,
		InscClaimAmtReimbursed as string,
		AttendingPhysician as string,
		OperatingPhysician as string,
		OtherPhysician as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_1 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_2 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_3 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_4 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_5 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_6 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_7 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_8 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_9 as string,
		ClmDiagnosisCode_10 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_1 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_2 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_3 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_4 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_5 as string,
		ClmProcedureCode_6 as string,
		DeductibleAmtPaid as string,
		ClmAdmitDiagnosisCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat('fdengine/dev/fdtarget/outpatient/',$processDate,'/Outpatient_',$processDate,'.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tgtoutpatient
